original_text: When Joab saw that the battle was set against him both in front and in the rear, he chose some of the best men of Israel and arrayed them against the Syrians.
korean_text: 요압이 자기와 맞서 앞뒤에 친 적진을 보고 이스라엘의 선발한 자 중에서 또 엄선하여 아람 사람과 싸우려고 진 치고

sentences.original_text: that the battle was set against him
both in front and in the rear
he chose some of the best men of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이스라엘의 최정예 병사 중 일부를 뽑았고

sentences.original_text: and arrayed them against the Syrians.
